function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of multi-source data access increases the risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and safety measures are not in place.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and safety protocols for all individuals interacting with the data access points.","Technologies":"Biometric access control, contactless interfaces.","People":"Data analysts, professionals, building occupants.","Owner":"IT security team, building management, data analysts."},{"Description":"Mobile interface and QR code scanning for building occupants may pose a risk of viral transmission if hygiene practices are not followed.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through shared mobile interface and QR code scanning.","Mitigation":"Provide sanitization stations for mobile devices, enforce mask-wearing, and promote hand hygiene among the building occupants.","Technologies":"Contactless QR code scanning, touchless interfaces.","People":"Building occupants.","Owner":"Building management, hygiene and sanitation team."},{"Description":"Real-time IEQ data assessment through the mobile interface creates an environment for potential virus exposure among the occupants if proper sanitization measures are not in place.","Impact":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases due to frequent use of the mobile interface for IEQ assessment.","Mitigation":"Frequent sanitization of mobile devices, promotion of individual device use, and regular cleaning of interface access points.","Technologies":"Contactless interfaces, UV sanitization devices.","People":"Building occupants.","Owner":"Building management, hygiene and sanitation team."}]}
